rule.name: asicOverTempReset
rule.description: reset happened due to over temperature of ASIC

rule.name: lowPower
rule.description: FabricIT management appliance has insufficient power

rule.name: bxAsicOverTempReset
rule.description: reset happened due to over temperature of bx ASIC

rule.name: internalBusError
rule.description: I2C access failed more than 5 times

rule.name: procCrash
rule.description: A process managed by FabricIT has terminated unexpectedly and left a core file

rule.name: cpuUtilHigh
rule.description: The FabricIT management appliance CPU is very busy

rule.name: procUnexpectedExit
rule.description: A process managed by FabricIT has terminated unexpectedly and no core file was found

rule.name: unexpectedShutdown
rule.description: FabricIT management appliance shut down unexpectedly

rule.name: diskSpaceLow
rule.description: FabricIT management appliance is running out of disk space

rule.name: lowPowerRecover
rule.description: FabricIT management appliance has restored to normal power

rule.name: insufficientFans
rule.description: FabricIT management appliance has insufficient number of working fans

rule.name: insufficientFansRecover
rule.description: FabricIT management appliance has a sufficient number of working fans

rule.name: mlxIBCAHealthStatusChange
rule.description: The overall health status of the channel adapter has changed

rule.name: mlxIBCAInsertion
rule.description: A channel adapter has been inserted in the system

rule.name: mlxIBCARemoval
rule.description: A channel adapter has been removed from the system

rule.name: mlxIBSwitchInsertion
rule.description: A switch has been inserted in the system

rule.name: mlxIBSwitchRemoval
rule.description: A switch has been removed from the system

rule.name: mlxIBRouterInsertion
rule.description: A router has been inserted in the system

rule.name: mlxIBRouterRemoval
rule.description: The FabricIT management appliance CPU is very busy

rule.name: mlxIBPortPhysicalStateChange
rule.description: The physical port state has changed

rule.name: mlxIBPortInsertion
rule.description: An IBA port has been inserted in the system

rule.name: mlxIBPortRemoval
rule.description: An IB port has been removed from the system

rule.name: vol_ufmPortBandwidthThresholdReached
rule.description: Port Normalized Transmit BW counter threshold exceeded

rule.name: vol_ufmNon-optimallinkwidth
rule.description: Found a link that operates in non-optimal width mode

rule.name: vol_ufmPortNormalizedTransmitWait
rule.description: Port Normalized Transmit Wait counter threshold exceeded

rule.name: vol_ufmFlowControlUpdateWatchdogTimerExpired
rule.description: Flow Control Update watchdog timer has expired

rule.name: vol_ufmDuplicatedlicenses
rule.description: Duplicate Serial Number %s detected on installed licenses

rule.name: vol_ufmBadP_KeySwitchExternalPort
rule.description: Bad P Key for Switch External Port

rule.name: vol_ufmLogicalServerStateChangeFailed
rule.description: Logical Server failed to changed state

rule.name: vol_ufmLogicalServerComputeResourceisDown
rule.description: Logical Server Compute Resource is Down

rule.name: vol_ufmLogicalServerComputeResourceisUp
rule.description: Logical Server Compute Resource is Up

rule.name: vol_ufmNodeisUp
rule.description: Site configuration changes node is Up

rule.name: vol_ufmGatewayEthernetLinkStateChanged
rule.description: Ethernet link has changed its state

rule.name: vol_ufmGatewayRe-registerEventReceived
rule.description: Gateway received a re-register event from the SM

rule.name: vol_ufmNumberofGatewaysisChanged
rule.description: Change in the number of 10GbE Gateways has been detected

rule.name: vol_ufmSwitchChipAdded
rule.description: Chip on module was added to switch

rule.name: vol_ufmSwitchChipRemoved
rule.description: Chip on module was removed from switch

rule.name: vol_ufmDevicePendingReboot
rule.description: The device software has been updated and it is pending reboot

rule.name: vol_ufmUFMBackUpFinishedWithError
rule.description: UFM backup has finished with error

rule.name: vol_ufmFabricHealthReportInfo
rule.description: FabricHealth Report completed without Errors or Warnings

rule.name: vol_ufmRestartofUFM-relatedprocesssucceeded
rule.description: UFM related process is started successfully

rule.name: vol_ufmDiskutilizationthresholdreached
rule.description: Disk space usage is above the threshold

rule.name: vol_ufmMemoryutilizationthresholdreached
rule.description: Memory usage is above the threshold

rule.name: vol_ufmCPUutilizationthresholdreached
rule.description: CPU usage is above the threshold

rule.name: vol_ufmDRBDBadCondition
rule.description: Drbd bad condition detected, failover or takeover will fail

rule.name: vol_ufmNon-optimalLinkSpeed
rule.description: Found a link that operates in non-optimal speed mode

rule.description: Drop Events counter threshold was exceeded

rule.description: Oversize Packets counter threshold was exceeded
